title: A RESOLUTION RESPECTFULLY REQUESTING THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO RECONSIDER THE CONTINUED USE OF THE GABALDON BUILDING IN BARANGAY TIMUGAN FOR VITAL TOURISM RELATED SKILLS TRAINING PROGRAMS AS PER ORDINANCE NO. 2009-869 DATED JULY 6, 2009 ENTITLED, “ORDINANCE ESTABLISHING THE PUBLIC EMPLOYMENT SERVICES OFFICE- CITIZEN ACCESS (PESO-CAESAR) AT GABALDON BUILDING, BARANGAY TIMUGAN, LOS BANOS, LAGUNA”. Author
